articles.title: Earth's Forests Aren't Just Shrinking, They're Getting Younger - And That's a Problem - ScienceAlert
articles.description: The fate of Earth's forests remains uncertain. In the past few years, humans have removed more than 40 football fields of tree cover every single minute; altogether, it's an annual chunk of greenery roughly the size of the United Kingdom.
articles.content: The fate of Earth's forests remains uncertain. In the past few years, humans have removed more than 40 football fields of tree cover every single minute; altogether, it's an annual chunk of greenery … [+5402 chars]

articles.author: Liam Doyle
articles.title: Yellowstone volcano eruption: What would happen if Yellowstone erupted? - Express.co.uk
articles.description: YELLOWSTONE VOLCANO eruptions have long occupied geologists and the general public alike, with many people fearing eventual worldwide cataclysm at the hands of the Californian mountain. What would happen if Yellowstone erupted?

articles.author: Chris Godfrey
articles.title: Gareth Thomas on coming out as HIV positive: 'It was my right to tell my family – not somebody else's' - The Guardian
articles.description: The Welsh rugby star talks about why he revealed his status, his mission to help others deal with prejudice – and how Mickey Rourke nearly played him in a biopic of his life
articles.content: The moment Gareth Thomas found out he was HIV positive, all he could imagine was the Aids epidemic. Sensational images of his future took over: frailty, shame, isolation, social exclusion. He remembe… [+11928 chars]

articles.title: NASA warns about ‘potentially dangerous’ asteroid approaching Earth - TASS
articles.description: The diameter of the asteroid is between 250 and 570 meters
